q: This morning Kirsten Gillibrand was on Morning Joe, and the hosts asked her to talk about Gabrielle Giffords as a person. ''She's the most non-partisan person I've ever met,'' Kirsten Gillibrand said. She's the vision of hope for this country right now. She embodies everything that Barack Obama was trying to say, that we have to be better than we are. and provocative.( David Paul Morris/Getty Images) LOS ANGELES-After three weeks in office and days filled with meetings, legislators came up with a proposal that state Treasurer Bill Lockyer calls ''realistic and provocative.'' The plan acknowledges that a balanced remedy of spending reductions and revenues is the best cure, Bill Lockyer said in a statement. The California legislature's logjams during attempts to develop effective responses to the growing deficit had become a perennial problem since the worldwide economic meltdown began.
